segments.text: Well , how did you enjoy your seaside trip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me about it , will you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we drove through the valley on our way there in the morning . It was a magnificent sight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you stop at the big waterfall for pictures ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , we wouldn't miss it for anything . After that , we took a short cut to the park . There was very little traffic , so we got there in less than an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You were lucky then . What did you do after that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We went for a swim in the sea . That was the best part of the day . Just look at my nice tan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you must have had a busy and enjoyable day yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you're right . And I was so tired that I fell asleep on the way back . My arms are still stiff from the swim yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2
